SEARCH
Package Simulation

Class Event

java.lang.Object
Simulation.Event
Direct Known Subclasses:
antMoveEvent, PheromoneEvaporationEvent, SimulationReport
public abstract class Event extends Object
The abstract class representing an event in the simulation.
